de.mpa.db.storager

Class SpectrumStorager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.db.storager.BasicStorager
      • de.mpa.db.storager.SpectrumStorager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storager, Runnable

    public class SpectrumStorager
extends BasicStorager
    This class handles the storage of the spectrum files.
    Author:
    T.Muth
